Windows:
clang-cl /LD /EHsc /O2 -Xclang -std=c++11 imgui.cpp imgui_widgets.cpp imgui_tables.cpp imgui_draw.cpp backends/imgui_impl_sdl3.cpp backends/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp rde_imgui.cpp -I. -I../SDL3 -I../SDL3/include -I../ -I../../../engine/include ../../libs/windows/SDL3.lib -o imgui.dll && cp imgui.dll ../../libs/windows/ && rm imgui.dll && cp imgui.lib ../../libs/windows/ && rm imgui.lib

Linux:
clang++ -shared -fPIC imgui.cpp imgui_widgets.cpp imgui_tables.cpp imgui_draw.cpp backends/imgui_impl_sdl3.cpp backends/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp rde_imgui.cpp -I. -I../SDL3 -I../SDL3/include -I../ -I../../../engine/include ../../libs/linux/libSDL3.so -o librde_imgui.so &&  cp librde_imgui.so ../../libs/linux/ && rm librde_imgui.so

Mac:
clang++ -O3 -std=c++17 -shared -fPIC -mmacosx-version-min=$(sw_vers -productVersion) imgui.cpp imgui_widgets.cpp imgui_tables.cpp imgui_draw.cpp backends/imgui_impl_sdl3.cpp backends/imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp rde_imgui.cpp -lc++ -I. -I../SDL3 -I../SDL3/include -I../ -I../../../engine/include ../../libs/osx/libSDL3.dylib -o librde_imgui.dylib && cp librde_imgui.dylib ../../libs/osx && rm librde_imgui.dylib
